description: It's tough having a roommate. Privacy just goes out the window! Even when you think you have a moment alone to yourself, any second your roomie might come barging in. Especially when it's two guys and one of them is a bit oblivious. Then Alexander plows Tony in the bathroom as Tony moans in ecstasy as the long, thick dick penetrates him to lengths that no dick has ever reached in him before. Lucky for him, if he ever wants to feel that big dick again, Alexander's room is just a few feet away!
title: Shower Shock
